lead_paragraph: BLOOM--Leonard, 86 years old, passed away on January 16, 2016. Beloved husband of Annette. Devoted father of Elise and Greg and Bryan and Jill. Cherished grandfather of Jenna and Allie. Services were held on Sunday. 1/3
